RECORD TYPE: PRESIDENTIAL      (NOTES MAIL)

CREATOR: Elena Kagan ( CN;Elena Kagan/OU;OPD/O;EOP [ OPD 1 )

CREATION DATE/TIME:28-APR-1997 17:27:37.00

SUBJECT:   Party for John Hart on Thursday

TO: Laura Emmett ( CN;Laura Emmett/OU;WHO/O;EOP @ EOP [ WHO 1 )
READ:UNKNOWN

TEXT:
i'd like to go to this.
---------------------- Forwarded by Elena Kagan/OPD/EOP on 04/28/97 05:31
PM ---------------------------


   Suzanne Dale                   04/28/97 01:14:39 PM

Record Type:      Non-Record

To:      See the distribution list at the bottom of this message
cc:
Subject:         Party for John Hart on Thursday

The FOJ Committee* Invites You . . .

As you may already know, John Hart will be leaving the White House after
nearly five years of service to the Administration.  The FOJ Committee*
will be hosting a farewell reception this Thursday, May 1, in the Indian
Treaty Room from 3:00 - 5:00pm, and they invite you to attend.  If you
will be coming, please RSVP to the Office of Intergovernmental Affairs at
6-2896 by Wednesday, April 30, at noon.

* Friends of John Committee



Message Sent
